record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 29, 2007)

[Page: H12134]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on October 29, 2007, I missed 3 recorded votes.

I take my voting responsibility very seriously and would like the CONGRESSIONAL RECORD to reflect that, had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on recorded vote No. 1010, "yea" on recorded vote 1011 and "yea" on recorded vote 1012.
